techmeme.title: The Trump administration announces plans to reorganize the US AI Safety Institute into the new Center for AI Standards and Innovation (Thomas Brewster/Forbes)
A federal judge temporarily blocks Florida from enforcing a law banning social media accounts for children under 14, saying the law is "likely unconstitutional" (Kate Payne/Associated Press)
OpenAI updates its coding agent Codex with internet access, turned off by default, and expands availability to ChatGPT Plus users (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Sources: Pump.fun plans to raise $1B via a token sale at a $4B valuation; Pump.fun has generated over $700M in cumulative revenue since its launch in early 2024 (Blockworks)
TikTok has banned the hashtag #SkinnyTok globally, saying it is "linked to unhealthy weight loss content", following pressure from the French government (Théophane Hartmann/Euractiv)
